feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Going in to exult over a fallen enemy, and to praise a strong-minded sister for the banishment of an objectionable lover, it certainly was a shock to behold the aforesaid enemy serenely sitting on the sofa, with the strong-minded sister enthroned upon his knee, and wearing an expression of the most abject submission.

feels.name: Jealousy
feels.quote: Jo loved a few persons very dearly, and dreaded to have their affection lost or lessened in any way.

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: Here comes Laurie. Now we shall have a little sensible conversation.

feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: Rushing upstairs, she startled the invalids by exclaiming tragically, as she burst into the room, 'Oh do somebody go down quick; John Brooke is acting dreadfully, and Meg likes it!'

feels.name: Comfort
feels.quote: 'You've got me, anyhow. I'm not good for much, I know; but I'll stand by you, Jo, all the days of my life; upon my word I will!' and Laurie meant what he said.

Places.name: Parlor
Places.description: Where Jo was surprised to see Meg and Mr. Brooke together.

Places.name: Parlor
Places.description: Where Jo felt jealous of Meg and Mr. Brooke.

Places.name: Parlor
Places.description: Where Jo felt relief upon Laurie's arrival.

Places.name: Parlor
Places.description: Where Jo felt sadness about Meg and Mr. Brooke.

Places.name: Parlor
Places.description: Where Jo felt comforted by Laurie.
